text:
Thomas
testing required extensions consistently fails for Batik.  The only way to test
is to use the empty string, since one cannot generically test for extensions to
a client.
The empty string is supposed to return false, both BitFlash and Adobe recognize
this, Batik does not.

eg.
<text requiredExtensions="" x="10" y="60">This text should not display</text>

Cheers!
Rick.
creator: rick@svgz.org
